Recommendations: 1. The unserviceable equipment which are still kept in the laboratory rooms need to be disposed to maximize the use of the area.
2. Calibration of the equipment may be done by skilled technicians from DOST if the suppliers of the specific equipment is not available.
3. The inventories of laboratory equipment are not properly documented such as date inventory was conducted, who conducted and no signature.
4. The showers with washers room may immediately be installed to make it available in time of emergency
5. Put signages that directs the location of laboratory facilities and other installations and label each equipment aside from glue property sticker for proper identification.
